This is not a problem that needs fixing, just a misunderstanding of how it works. Each individual like counts against the 25 limit for 24 hours. As one passes 24 hours, it expires and another like becomes available to use within the limit. If you then use it immediately you're back at the limit until the next oldest one hits 24 hours and expires.

We won't be upping the 25 likes/24 hours limit, sorry. I personally would argue it's too high as it is.

I think each one expires after 24h individually, so if you've been late and have likes at 2am, you'll have to wait more than you expected.
